prompts: Create a cute Electric-type Pokemon resembling a round, fuzzy creature with a playful expression.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that has a predominantly gray body with yellow accents and a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that's small, rotund, and has a tail resembling a lightning bolt, full of energy!
Generate an adorable Pokemon with large cheeks, primarily gray in color, that loves to roll around.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a combination of a mouse and a hedgehog, with bright yellow highlights.
Give me a round Pokemon that has a happy face, fluffy body, and a hint of mischief in its eyes.
Make a character concept for a playful Electric-type Pokemon that enjoys living in grassy areas.

distinctive_features: Tail shaped like a lightning bolt

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile with Electric-type moves
